title: UN rights council orders international probe into Ethiopia abuses
content:
1. UN rights council orders international probe into Ethiopia abuses  Al Jazeera English
  2. U.N. rights forum agrees to investigate abuses in Ethiopia  Reuters
  3. "Global paralysis" at U.N. over Ethiopia war allows atrocities to continue unabated  CBS News
  4. Ethiopia slams new probe proposal at UN rights body session  Al Jazeera English
  5. LIVE: UNHRC holds special session on Ethiopia conflict  Reuters
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 国連人権理事会、エチオピアの虐待に関する国際調査を命令
联合国人权理事会下令对埃塞俄比亚的侵权行为进行国际调查
